summary: This document is a letter dated February 1, 2021, regarding access to a laptop from the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC). It is addressed to the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating a formal request or notification concerning evidence or property in the case.

events.title: Letter Regarding MDC Laptop Access
events.description: A letter was sent to the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York concerning access to a laptop from the Metropolitan Detention Center.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: A formal letter was sent on February 1, 2021, regarding access to a laptop from the Metropolitan Detention Center.
The correspondence was directed to the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document suggests ongoing legal or investigative procedures related to evidence or property in custody.
